description: Replaces the current rules of the specified IP access control group with the specified rules.

parameters.name: UserRules
parameters.description: One or more rules. (dict) --- Describes a rule for an IP access control group. ipRule (string) --- The IP address range, in CIDR notation. ruleDesc (string) --- The description.

nested_params.name: ipRule
nested_params.description: The IP address range, in CIDR notation.
